be a guest at the royal wedding Despite being a pop music king Simon Cowell says he won't be a guest at the royal wedding of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge . Talking on American morning TV the music mogul said: I haven't been invited. When the presenter of The Today Show, Matt Lauer , asked if he thought he would get an invite in the future he said:`` No. But I'll probably be allowed to wave in the street

the mummies.`` But demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum- but they were already damaged,'' said Zahi Hawass , head of the museum's antiquities department. Only their heads were intact. The fate of the vandals remains unknown. The Egyptian museum, which houses invaluable treasures of antiquity, was surrounded on Saturday by a human chain formed by dozens of Egyptians to fend off looters.

some concern that the two new superstar judges might distract from the promised return to a focus on the contestants.`` My biggest hope is that` Idol' finds one-of-a-kind talent this season,'' Jim Cantiello said. Ellen DeGeneres proved that a big star on the judges' panel does not necessarily ensure a must-see` Idol.' The show lives and dies by the contestants it highlights. If they don't find the most compelling, the most interesting and the most talented group of singers, the show is going to be as culturally relevant as` Skating With the Celebrities.' Don't miss our`` American Idol'' live stream`` Judging the Judges: An` Idol' Without Simon Cowell ,'' featuring post-show analysis from Jim Cantiello and special guests, on MTV.com tonight at 10 p.m.
